examples.example: 每当拿起电话，我就感觉和远方的亲人朋友拉近了距离。

translate.english: Whenever I pick up the phone, I feel the distance between me and my distant relatives and friends has been shortened.

examples.example: 通过电话，我和许久未见的老友畅快地交流着彼此的生活点滴，十分开心。

translate.english: Via the phone, I had a pleasant chat with an old friend whom I hadn't seen for a long time, sharing bits and pieces of our lives, and was very happy.

examples.example: 每当电话铃声响起，我就知道又有好消息要传来啦。

translate.english: Whenever the phone rings, I know that there will be good news coming again.
